column5: Has anyone used Wilderness Air? I'm looking at a fly in trip with them next summer. Any info would be appreciated.

Where I go on Eagle Lake the tourist camp next door stopped using their own plane for their guests this year and went to using wilderness air. The camp is a 5 star rated camp and I don't think they would use anything less than a safety oriented carrier for their guests.
It's a well run operation with good equipment, facilities and plenty of repeat guests. I would recommend them without hesitation. They have been in business for many years.
